lastName.description: the last name of the profile

firstName.description: the first name of the profile

profileType.description: This attribute is added for account-based commerce, It's value is 'b2b_user'

repositoryId.description: the repository id of the role

receiveEmail.description: this is email marketing flag. can be yes or no

active.description: This is active status of the profile should be true or false.

id.description: get the shopper profile with id

parentOrganization.description: This attribute is added for 'Account-Based Commerce', this is required only in case of 'Account-Based Commerce', this is the id of organization to which user is associated

name.description: the name of the parent organization

repositoryId.description: the id of the parent organization

active.description: the status of the parent organization. Should be true or false

shippingAddress.description: Default shipping address of the organization

repositoryId.description: the id of the shipping address

secondaryAddresses.description: List of shipping addresses associated with the profile.

AddressType.description: Address type represents nick-name of address.

repositoryId.description: Repository ID of the shipping address

id.description: the id of the parent organization

billingAddress.description: Default billing address of the organization

repositoryId.description: the id of the billing address

email.description: the email address of the profile
